product_name: Slime Self-Sealing Smart Presta Tube - 700 x 19 - 25
long_description: Prevent flat tires from slowing down your ride with this pre-filled, self-sealing Slime Presta Tube. Tubes filled with specially formulated Slime product seals instantly when tube is punctured or pinched. Fits 700 x 19 - 25 sized tires; stem length is 39 mm. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Prevent flat tires from slowing down your ride with this pre-filled, self-sealing Slime Presta Tube.
